name: Doodle Brawl
description:
Draw your brawler and send them off to battle!

Doodle brawl is a button mashing brawler inspired by stick fight! The only playable characters are ones that YOU create!

  • Draw your brawlers!
  • Join with up to 5 players on one screen!
  • Fight to be the last one standing!

Currently Doodle Brawl features 15 different maps and 20 different guns - enough to give you an idea of what the gameplay should feel like while I add more content.

Weapons currently in the game :

  • Pistol
  • Machine Pistol
  • Rifle
  • Shotgun
  • Assault Rifle
  • Laser Pistol
  • Auto Shotgun
  • Pistol Pistol (Hehehe...)
  • Bullet Hell Cannon
  • Laser Rifle
  • Laser Shotgun
  • Grenade Launcher
  • Cluster Launcher
  • RPG Launcher
  • Minigun
  • Supernova
  • RPG-MG
  • Hose
  • Landmine Gun
  • Fireworks Gun

Feel free to comment any ideas for levels, weapons, etc. and enjoy the game!
